i booked through hotel quickly and got a very best rate
At the price one of the best hotels we have visited in the world

Makes the whole stay worth the extra cost
Beautiful pool but not very good value for price
Location is great and the waterfall restaurant is pretty good and reasonably priced
Very comfortable and tasteful but not to the extent expected for the cost
Seriously asking me to pay more so my hotel room is quiet
1: We would choose Shangri la again as a retired person the accommodation cost is significant

About 3x expensive vs many places in Singapore
